items.sentence: Tom and Mary started talking like old friends.
Tom and Mary talked about all kinds of things.
Tom and Mary talked until 2:30 in the morning.
Mary separated from her husband two years ago.
Tom added some interesting spices to the stew.
Tom agreed to give Mary three hundred dollars.
Why do you think that it was Tom who did that?
I can still remember the first time I saw you.
We need to get Tom to the hospital right away.
We only have enough food to feed three people.
